question: Which property is used to change the text color?
What does the 'box-sizing' property in CSS do?
options: Defines the size of the text box
Sets the model for how the total width and height
Specifies the shape of a box element
correctAnswer: Sets the model for how the total width and height

question: Which CSS property is used to control the spacing ?
What does the 'float' property in CSS do?
options: Makes an element flow horizontally in the opposite direction
Adds a floating effect to the element
Aligns the element to the right side of its container
Causes an element to be removed from the normal
correctAnswer: Causes an element to be removed from the normal

question: Which CSS property is used to set the background ?
What does the CSS property 'display: none;' do?
options: Hides the element from the page without
Removes the element from the DOM completely
Displays the element as a block-level element
Centers the element horizontally on the page
correctAnswer: Hides the element from the page without

question: What is the purpose of the CSS 'z-index' property?
options: Sets the width of the element
Defines the position of the element within its container
Controls the opacity of the element

question: Which CSS property is used to add shadows to elements?
What does the CSS property 'position: fixed;' do?
options: Positions the element relative to its closest positioned ancestor
Positions the element relative to the viewport
Locks the element's position so it cannot be moved
Floats the element to the right side of its container
correctAnswer: Positions the element relative to the viewport
